channel.title: Read now
channel.description:
Hey,
if you know me or not it doesn't matter.
I just wanna let you know today is the day i quit private servers including my server PKScapeX/RuneIsle.
If theres one thing i'll tell you, there's always someone better than you who will flame you for what you do, live with it or quit, private servers will die in the end, if you leave, you'll change, believe me. [B] Ryan[/B]
If you're interested in mroe detail read here:
http://runeisle.com/showthread.php?p=19504#post19504
Respect to everyone who feels they really will make it as a private server programmer.
Extra note: The link is not advertising, there's nothing to ADVERTISE for, it's a leaving thread :S
Also, i'm not asking to be flamed, just leave it if you're gonna be flamed.
I know some people hate me for diff reasons, if it's because i flamed you, i'm sorry, i'm just like that, if it's because of the spamvertising, i'm sorry, but i got 5K members from it, so who wouldn't.

I always wanted to do something IT related, but now i go to college every thursday and do construction i’ll probably become a plasterer or brick layer.

Read full topic
